text: Eddy Serri (born 23 November 1974 in Faenza) is an Italian former cyclist. ==Major results== ;1996 :1st Stage 1 Girobio ;2003 :1st Stage 2 Ster Elektrotoer :2nd Giro della Romagna :3rd Trofeo Città di Castelfidardo ;2006 :3rd Trofeo Città di Castelfidardo ;2007 :1st Giro della Romagna ;2008 :1st Giro del Mendrisiotto ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Eddy Serri
